gurmukhi: dust ijqy; auTvq auqpwqw ]skl mlyC; kro rx Gwqw ]20]
transliteration: Dousht Jite Outhvat Outpaataa|| Sakal Malechh Daro Ran Ghaataa||396||
translation: All the villains creations outrage and all the infidels be destroyed in the battlefield.396.

gurmukhi: jy AisDuj; qv srnI pry ]iqn ky dust; duiKq hÍY mry ]
transliteration: Je As(i)dhuj Tav Sharnidare|| Tin Ke Dousht Doukhit Hvai Dare||
translation: O Supreme Destroyer ! those who sought Thy refuge, their enemies met painful death;

gurmukhi: purK jvn; pg pry iqhwry ]iqn ky; qum sMkt sB twry ]21]
transliteration: Purakh Javan Pag(u) Dare Tihdare|| Tin Ke Toum Sankat Sabh Tdare||397||
translation: The persons who fell at Thy Feet, Thou didst remove all their troubles.397.

gurmukhi: jo kil ko; iek bwr iDAYhY ]qw ky; kwl inkit nih AYhY ]
transliteration: Jo Kal(i) Kau Ik Baar Dhiai-haai|| Taa Ke Kaal Nikattee Nah(i) Aihai||
translation: Those who meditate even on the Supreme Destroyer, the death cannot approach them;

gurmukhi: r`Cw hoie qwih; sB kwlw ]dust Airst; trYN qqkwlw ]22]
transliteration: Rachchhaadhoe Taahe Sabh Kaalaa|| Dousht Arisht Dare Tatkaalaa||398||
translation: They remain protected at all times; their enemies and troubles come to and end instantly.398.

gurmukhi: ik®pw idRsit; qn jwih inhirho ]qw ky qwp; qnk mih hirho ]
transliteration: Kridaa Drishttee Tan Jaahe Nidariho|| Taake Taap Tanak Maih Hariho||
translation: Upon whomsoever Thou dost cast Thy favourable glance, they are absolved of sins instantly;

gurmukhi: ir`iD is`iD; Gr mo sB hoeI ]dust Cwh; CÍY skY n koeI ]23]
transliteration: Riddh(i) Siddh(i) Ghar Mon Sabh Hoee|| Dousht Chhaad Chhvai Sakai Na Koee||399||
translation: They have all the worldly and spiritual pleasures in their homes; none of th enemies can even touch their shadow.399.

gurmukhi: eyk bwr; ijn qumY sMBwrw ]kwl Pws qy; qwih aubwrw ]
transliteration: Ek Haar Jin Toumain Sanbhaaraa|| Kaal Phaas Te Taahe Oubaaraa||
translation: He, who remembered Thee even once, Thou didst protect him from the noose of death;

gurmukhi: ijn nr; nwm iqhwro khw ]dwird dust; doK qy rhw ]24]
transliteration: Jin Nar Naam Tihdaro Kahaa|| Daarid Dousht Dokh Te Rahaa||400||
translation: Those persons, who repeated Thy Name, they were saved from poverty and attacks of enemies.400.

gurmukhi: KVgkyq; mY srix iqhwrI ]Awpu hwQ dY; lyhu aubwrI ]
transliteration: Khadag Ket Main Sharan(i) Tihdaree|| Aap Haath Dai Lehu Oubharee||
translation: Bestow thy help own me at all places protect me from the design of my enemies. 401.

gurmukhi: srb TOr; mo hohu shweI ]dust doK qy; lyhu bcweI ]25]
transliteration: Sarab Thaur Mo Hoh(u) Sahaai|| Dousht Dokh Te Lehu Bachaaee||401||
translation: Bestow Thy help on me at all places and protect me from the designs of my enemies.401.

gurmukhi: ik®pw krI; hm pr jg mwqw ]gRMQ krw pUrn; suB rwqw ]
transliteration: Kridaa Kariham Par Jagmaataa|| Granth Karaa Pooran Soubh Raataa||
translation: The Mother of the world has been kind towards me and I have completed the book this auspicious night;

gurmukhi: iklibK skl dyh ko; hrqw ]dust doiKXn ko; CY krqw ]26]
transliteration: Kilbikh Sakal Deh Ko Hartaa|| Dousht Dokhiyan Ko Chhai Kartaa||402||
translation: The Lord is the destroyer of all the sins of the body and all the malicious and wicked persons.402.

gurmukhi: sRI AisDuj; jb Bey dieAwlw ]pUrn krw gRMQ; qqkwlw ]
transliteration: Srias(i)dhuj Jab Bhae Dayaalaa|| Pooran Karaa Granth Tatkaalaa||
translation: When Mahakal became kind, He immediately caused me to complete this book;
